name: Photographic Amplitude Workshop
description: Covers the essentials of classic composition as applied to everyday photography and how to harness the basic technical functions of your camera to capture more compelling images straight from your camera - together, we will work toward the development of your style. Some topics to include: compositional theory, portraiture, blurring backgrounds, freezing action / capturing movement, night photography, and all of the technical fundamentals to capture moments according to your artistic vision. As it is always beneficial to learn by doing, this 4 hour workshop will consist of an in-depth 1.5 hour lecture, a 2 hour photo walk in Downtown Los Angeles to put what we've learned to practice (along with trained staff to help you achieve your artistic vision), ending with a half-hour image review and group critique back in the classroom at the beautiful Standard Hotel in downtown Los Angeles. *This is not a lighting/modeling workshop, and we will be focused on using just your camera and available light. For more information on dates and locations please 'like' the facebook page through the button on the bottom of the menu. More examples of my work: Paul Vu Photography Paul at 500px

name: Photoshop Essentials Workshop
description: Covers the essential tools used for post-processing your images using industry standard software. Learn to properly manipulate light and color through in-depth explanations of requisite tools and functions, along with a plethora of tips and tricks to create more compelling images. Two hour workshop to cover light + color manipulation, tones, basic retouching, perspective correction, and file handling. All workshop examples included with course outline so that you can follow along during the lecture if you bring a laptop, which is strongly encouraged. Classes will be held in the beautiful Standard Hotel in downtown Los Angeles. For more information on dates and locations please 'like' the facebook page through the button on the bottom of the menu. More examples of my work: Paul Vu Photography Paul at 500px

name: Photographic Amplitude + Photoshop Essentials
description: Combines the Photographic Amplitude + Photoshop Essentials lectures into an all day workshop at a discounted price. Seating is limited! For more information on dates and locations please 'like' the facebook page through the button on the bottom of the menu. More examples of my work: Paul Vu Photography Paul at 500px
